onMarkerDragEnd(com.google.android.gms.m.Description: Called when a marker has finished being dragged. The marker's location can be accessed via @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#Marker#getPosition_E@.

onMarkerDrag(com.google.android.gms.maps.Description: Called repeatedly while a marker is being dragged. The marker's location can be accessed via @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#Marker#getPosition_E@.

onMarkerDragStart(com.google.android.gms.Description: Called when a marker starts being dragged. The marker's location can be accessed via @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#Marker#getPosition_E@; this position may be different to the position prior to the start of the drag because the marker is popped up above the touch point.

ClassDesc: Callback interface for drag events on markers.
